markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Sand Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=346) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 80

</column>

---

The camel Strides twice with a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed, ignoring difficult terrain caused by rubble, sand, and uneven ground made of earth and stone.
name: Sand Stride
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 80
